parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the windshield wipers can reduce visibility to zero, leading to accidents or near-misses, especially during heavy rain or inclement weather.
symptoms: and stop working; windshield wipers get stuck; windshield wipers do not work properly; windshield wiper arms are not synchronized.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of dealerships to properly address the windshield wiper recall can lead to continued safety risks for drivers, including reduced visibility and accidents.
symptoms: Dealerships do not have parts to correct the recall; dealerships do not honor the recall; only partial repairs are made.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear windshield wiper can reduce rear visibility, leading to accidents or near-misses, especially during heavy rain or inclement weather.
symptoms: Rear windshield wipers do not operate; rear windshield wipers fail to clear water.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of windows and mirrors can lead to safety risks, including reduced visibility and accidents.
symptoms: Loose glass pane on passenger side rear window; windshield wiper pivot failed; interior parts for sideview mirrors are made of cheap plastic; exterior mirrors are inoperative; tailgate power window blew out of vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the sliding door can cause the door to fall off while driving or opening, which can lead to accidents, injuries, or property damage.
symptoms: The sliding door falls off while driving or opening

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A short circuit in the radio circuit board can cause a fire, potentially leading to vehicle damage, injury, or even total loss.
symptoms: Radio speakers malfunction or stop working
smoke or burning smell from the radio
